body:
I was just wondering if anybody around here had played these two amazing games?
Try not to give away any plot points or spoil anything, feel free to suggest similar games!
body_tagged:
I was just wondering if anybody around here had played these two amazing games?
Try not to give away any plot points or spoil anything, feel free to suggest similar games!
title: The Walking Dead and The Wolf among Us.

replies.body: I haven't played, but I have watched both on youtube. Very entertaining.
replies.body_tagged: I haven't played, but I have watched both on youtube. Very entertaining.

replies.body: Played the Walking Dead. Really great game.
replies.body_tagged: Played the Walking Dead. Really great game.

replies.body: Played Walking Dead also. Really really good. A nice break from all the FPS and generic games.
replies.body_tagged: Played Walking Dead also. Really really good. A nice break from all the FPS and generic games.

replies.body:
Heres a question:
Season 1 or 2?
(Seeing as you guys tend to be more interested in TWD)
replies.body_tagged:
Heres a question:
Season 1 or 2?
(Seeing as you guys tend to be more interested in TWD)

replies.body: Season 2 felt too short. I couldn't connect with any of the characters as I did with #1. Don't get me wrong, It was still a good game.
replies.body_tagged: Season 2 felt too short. I couldn't connect with any of the characters as I did with #1. Don't get me wrong, It was still a good game.

reply_to.body_tagged:
Heres a question:

replies.body: I'd start with 1 anyway and I think the first episode is free anyway so if you don't like that then you don't have to buy anymore.
replies.body_tagged: I'd start with 1 anyway and I think the first episode is free anyway so if you don't like that then you don't have to buy anymore.

replies.body:
I think they've cut too many characters off in season 2, it leaves you less attached to the survivors. But.... Kenny ;_;

I don't know if they can ever reach that same level of character design as the first season, the end was almost heartbreaking.

@Arachadonic
I've played both seasons, I was wondering which one you guys preffered ;)

replies.body: I <333333 The Walking Dead Season1.  I connected with the characters more emotionally than I did with the ones on season 2.
replies.body_tagged: I <333333 The Walking Dead Season1.  I connected with the characters more emotionally than I did with the ones on season 2.

replies.body:
Bump for timezones.
Anyone's opinions of The Wolf among Us?
Personally I think it's just as good as The Walking Dead.
